title: How to help my ex-husband move on - Quora

response.answer_text: By staying out of his way. Why are you thinking it’s your job to help him move on? I take it you are the one who initiated the divorce. Are you feeling guilty? Are you wanting him to hurry up and disappear faster? Are you being passive-aggressive? Your question smells fishy.

You can’t. He has to go through his own process without you. Let him do that. Your continued presence just delays his process, and your own. Leave him alone, and worry about how you should be moving on instead. Let him be.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Rose Anne Campbell
